apiClassifier.shortdesc: A contract for a Being who can be named and grouped for referencing.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A contract for a Being who can be named and grouped for referencing. A groupable Being has a unique name within the group it belongs to.

apiValue.shortdesc: The name of the group this Being is associated with.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The name of the group this Being is associated with.

apiValue.shortdesc: The name of this Being within its group.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The name of this Being within its group. This must be unique per-group.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A boundary made up of four exterior Edge shapes.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A boundary made up of four exterior Edge shapes.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The Camera used to view a World, typically centred on the main character.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The Camera used to view a World, typically centred on the main character. It allows you to move, rotate and scale the world around a given point.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Move the camera ontop of a Being within the World.

apiParam.apiDesc: The Being to look at.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Move the camera ontop of a Being within the World.

apiValue.shortdesc: Returns the options associated with the query.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Returns the options associated with the query.

apiValue.shortdesc: Returns the type of query that was made.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Returns the type of query that was made.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: An interface used to represent a unique Being within a World.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: An interface used to represent a unique Being within a World.

apiValue.shortdesc: A unique name representing the Being this contract is attached to.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: A unique name representing the Being this contract is attached to.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A Map defines a collection of Beings, events, quests, etc within a World at one time.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A Map defines a collection of Beings, events, quests, etc within a World at one time.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Grant access to update() within sentinel.gameplay.world.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Grant access to update() within sentinel.gameplay.world.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Alias for world.add().

apiParam.apiDesc: The Being to add to the World associated with this Map.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Alias for world.add().

apiOperation.shortdesc: Alias for world.remove().

apiParam.apiDesc: The Being to remove from the World associated with this Map.
Whether or not to deconstruct the target Being after removal.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Alias for world.remove().

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A single result within the list of results provided when querying the World, wrapping a Being and the physics level EngineQueryResult.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A single result within the list of results provided when querying the World, wrapping a Being and the physics level EngineQueryResult.

apiValue.shortdesc: The Being stored within this result.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The Being stored within this result.

apiValue.shortdesc: A reference to the Query that provided this result.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: A reference to the Query that provided this result.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The World is the core class for dealing with collections of Beings and the interactions between those Beings.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The World is the core class for dealing with collections of Beings and the interactions between those Beings. The World also deals with initializing a physics engine, if required.

apiParam.apiDesc: An EngineDef describing the physics engine.
A Debug instance describing the type of debugging to use.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Adds a Being to this World.

apiParam.apiDesc: The Being to add.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Adds a Being to this World.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Deconstruct this World and all the Beings within it.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Deconstruct this World and all the Beings within it.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a list of services to attach to this World.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a list of services to attach to this World.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a single Being from the specified group with a given name within that group.

apiParam.apiDesc: The group name.
The name of the Being within the group.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a single Being from the specified group with a given name within that group.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a list of Beings who belong to the specified group.

apiParam.apiDesc: The group name.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a list of Beings who belong to the specified group.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a WorldService with the specified name.

apiParam.apiDesc: The name of the WorldService to find.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a WorldService with the specified name.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a Being who implements IUnique and matches the specified unique name.

apiParam.apiDesc: The uniqueName value of the saught IUnique Being.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a Being who implements IUnique and matches the specified unique name.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Loads a new Map into this World.

apiParam.apiDesc: The Map to load.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Loads a new Map into this World.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Queries the World for a collection of Beings meeting a given criteria.

apiParam.apiDesc: The query to use.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Queries the World for a collection of Beings meeting a given criteria. The result Beings are contained within a WorldQueryResult, which provides additional information about the query made.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Register the list of classes extending Being that are used by this game.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Register the list of classes extending Being that are used by this game. This allows Being.create() to function correctly.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Removes a Being from this World.

apiParam.apiDesc: The Being to remove.
Whether or not to also deconstruct the Being once removed.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Removes a Being from this World.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Unload the current Map, if one exists.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Unload the current Map, if one exists. This will remove all Beings that currently exist within the World.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: An invisible boundary within a world, usually used with a collection of smaller display-only Beings e.g.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: An invisible boundary within a world, usually used with a collection of smaller display-only Beings e.g. a group of plants, a patch of water, etc.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Provides a service to be used by the World, e.g.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Provides a service to be used by the World, e.g. an enemy spawner, pickup generator, etc.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A Being is an object that lives in a World.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A Being is an object that lives in a World. It can define graphics and a physics body. It should be used as the base class for all of your gameplay objects within a World like trees, enemies, loot, projectiles, the main hero, etc. Because a Being is used to describe any element that could appear within a World, it can be also used to represent less obvious items like health bars and text that is attached to certain positions within the World.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Position and rotate the physics body owned by this Being to mimic its graphics.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Position and rotate the physics body owned by this Being to mimic its graphics. This method does nothing unless this Being owns both a physics body and graphics.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Position and rotate the graphics owned by this Being to mimic its physics body.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Position and rotate the graphics owned by this Being to mimic its physics body. This method does nothing unless this Being owns both graphics and a physics body.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Attempts to create a new Being from save data obtained via Being.save().

asCustoms.csharp: Change to something more useful like public T Create(...) where T : new(), Being.

apiParam.apiDesc: The type of object to try and create, as a fully qualified class name.
The save data.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Attempts to create a new Being from save data obtained via Being.save().

apiOperation.shortdesc: Deconstruct this Being.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Deconstruct this Being. Also deconstructs its graphics and physics body. If this Being belongs to a World, it will remove itself from it.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Defines a physics body to be used by this Being.

apiParam.apiDesc: A reference to the physics engine.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Defines a physics body to be used by this Being. The body is defined when this Being is added to a World.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Defines graphics to be used by this Being.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Defines graphics to be used by this Being. Graphics are defined when this Being is added to a World.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Applies properties stored in a simple object to this Being.

apiParam.apiDesc: The data to apply.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Applies properties stored in a simple object to this Being.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Utility to method for setting the x and y values at the same time.

apiParam.apiDesc: The new x coordinate.
The new y coordinate.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Utility to method for setting the x and y values at the same time.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Removes this Being from its parent World.

apiParam.apiDesc: Whether or not to also deconstruct() this Being.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Removes this Being from its parent World.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Saves a simple representation of this Being, useful for working with Being.create().

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Saves a simple representation of this Being, useful for working with Being.create().

apiValue.shortdesc: The physics body used by this Being.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The physics body used by this Being.

apiValue.shortdesc: The Map loaded by the parent World containing this Being.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The Map loaded by the parent World containing this Being.

apiValue.shortdesc: Returns the position of this Being.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Returns the position of this Being. Modifying the x or y values of the result will not affect this Being, use moveTo() or modify the x and y values of this Being directly instead.

apiValue.shortdesc: Get or set the rotation of this Being.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Get or set the rotation of this Being.

apiValue.shortdesc: Returns the active UI, if this Being is a descendant of GameplayState.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Returns the active UI, if this Being is a descendant of GameplayState.

apiValue.shortdesc: The parent World containing this Being.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The parent World containing this Being.

apiValue.shortdesc: Get or set the x position of this Being.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Get or set the x position of this Being. This is an alias for position.x and moveTo(value, y).

apiValue.shortdesc: Get or set the y position of this Being.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Get or set the y position of this Being. This is an alias for position.y and moveTo(x, value).

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A contract describing a Being who can be queried for via the World it is containing in.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A contract describing a Being who can be queried for via the World it is containing in. If a Being does not implement this interface, it will not appear in any listings generated by World.query().
